translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

Having Colonel Joaquim José da Silva and the citizen Rolino Pereira de Barros, both residents of this Department, offered, one as a loan and the other free of charge, one hundred fattening oxen each, may Your Excellency Napoleone Castellini take note.

God keep Your Excellency  
Secretary of the Treasury Affairs in Caçapava, March 23, 1839.  
Domingos José de Almeida  

Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima,  
General Chief of Police of the Department and Frontier of Alegrete.

March — 23 — 39. Almeida.

Presidency of the Republic Secretariat  
Most Illustrious Sir Joaquim dos Santos Prado Lima.  
General Collector and Chief of Police of the Department and Frontier of Alegrete.  
Interim Inspector of the National Public Treasury.
